At the time of the applicant ’s first placement in the clinic in GPE , the rules governing the detention of individuals in a psychiatric hospital were notably laid down in GPE of DATE on the detention of mentally insane persons , mentally deficient persons and drug addicts ( PERSON über die PERSON , PERSON ) .

CARDINAL . By section CARDINAL of the LAW , the district court was obliged to assign counsel to the person concerned if this was necessary for the protection of his interests .

CARDINAL . Under LAW , the court , in principle , had to question the person concerned before reaching its decision .
